acceptGovernorship().details: Allows new governor to accept governorship of the contract.

transferGovernorship(address).details: Transfers governorship of the contract to a new account (`proposedGovernor`). Can only be called by the current owner.

ProvidersAggregatorUpdated(address,addre.notice: Emitted when providers aggregator is updated

StableCoinProviderUpdated(address,addres.notice: Emitted when stable coin provider is updated

proposedGovernor().notice: The proposed governor account. Becomes the new governor after acceptance
